data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Saint George Gingerland, Saint Kitts and Nevis to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 1,950 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint George Gingerland, Saint Kitts and Nevis
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Saint George Gingerland, Saint Kitts and Nevis.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Saint George Gingerland, Saint Kitts and Nevis to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Saint George Gingerland against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Market Shop
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Market Shop, Saint George Gingerland, Saint Kitts and Nevis.
Over 7.47 percent of the people of Saint George Gingerland are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Lord, the the state of Saint George Gingerland will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.focus_label: Saint George Gingerland, Saint Kitts and Nevis

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Saint George Gingerland, Saint Kitts and Nevis. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
